tools.name: automake
tools.description: Automake is a tool for automatically generating Makefile.in files from Makefile.am files. It is part of the GNU build system and aids in simplifying the process of building software applications.

tools.name: azure-cli
tools.description: The Azure Command-Line Interface (CLI) is a set of commands used to manage Azure resources from the command line or in scripts.

tools.name: bat
tools.description: bat is a cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration.

tools.name: bitwarden-cli
tools.description: bitwarden-cli is a command line interface tool for accessing and managing passwords stored in the Bitwarden password manager.

tools.name: certbot
tools.description: Certbot is a free, open source software tool for automatically using Letâ€™s Encrypt certificates on manually-administrated websites to enable HTTPS.

tools.name: curl
tools.description: curl is a command-line tool for transferring data with URL syntax.

tools.name: derailed/k9s/k9s
tools.description: A CLI tool to navigate and observe Kubernetes resources in real-time

tools.name: direnv
tools.description: direnv is a directory-specific environment manager for shell environments.

tools.name: docker
tools.description: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.

tools.name: git
tools.description: git is a free and open-source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

tools.name: gnu-sed
tools.description: GNU sed is a stream editor for filtering and transforming text. It processes text line by line and can perform tasks such as search, find and replace, insert text, delete lines, and more.

tools.name: grep
tools.description: grep is a command-line utility for searching plain-text data sets for lines that match a regular expression.

tools.name: handbrake
tools.description: HandBrake is a free and open-source transcoder for digital video files, originally developed in 2003. It supports converting videos from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.

tools.name: hashicorp/tap/terraform
tools.description: Terraform is a tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently. It allows infrastructure to be described as code, providing a high-level configuration language that can be shared, reused, and versioned.

tools.name: helm
tools.description: Helm is a package manager for Kubernetes that helps you manage Kubernetes applications without manually configuring resources like deployments, services, and ingress.

tools.name: imagemagick
tools.description: ImageMagick is a free and open-source command-line tool for creating, editing, composing, or converting bitmap images.

tools.name: jq
tools.description: jq is a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor that allows you to filter, map, and transform JSON data with ease.

tools.name: libksba
tools.description: libksba is a library that provides a high-level interface to the functions provided by the Key Server (KS) bundle. It is used to parse X.509 and CMS related objects. It also helps in writing high-level related applications.

tools.name: mas
tools.description: mas is a CLI tool for discovering, installing, and updating App Store applications on macOS.

tools.name: minikube
tools.description: Minikube is a tool that makes it easy to run Kubernetes locally. It creates a single-node Kubernetes cluster on your local machine.

tools.name: mp4v2
tools.description: mp4v2 is a set of tools to create, inspect and modify MP4 files. It provides a library for working with MP4 files in C++ and a command-line tool for interacting with MP4 files.

tools.name: nvm
tools.description: nvm (Node Version Manager) is a tool that allows you to manage multiple versions of Node.js on your machine.

tools.name: ocrmypdf
tools.description: ocrmypdf is a command line tool for adding OCR text layer to scanned PDF files. It uses Tesseract OCR engine to recognize text in PDF images and creates a searchable PDF with embedded text.

tools.name: openjdk@11
tools.description: openjdk@11 is a Command Line Interface tool for managing OpenJDK 11 installations on your system.

tools.name: openssl@1.1
tools.description: OpenSSL is a robust, commercial-grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose cryptography library.

tools.name: opentofu
tools.description: opentofu is a CLI tool for managing and interacting with Tofu manifests, which are used for bootstrapping OpenShift clusters.

tools.name: oven-sh/bun/bun
tools.description: CLI tool that provides a virtual shell script oven for executing shell scripts easily and efficiently.

tools.name: pandoc
tools.description: Pandoc is a command-line tool for converting files from one markup format to another.

tools.name: pnpm
tools.description: Fast, disk space efficient package manager for Node.js projects

tools.name: pyenv-virtualenv
tools.description: pyenv-virtualenv is a plugin for pyenv that makes it easier to manage virtual environments for Python projects.

tools.name: ripgrep
tools.description: ripgrep is a line-oriented search tool that recursively searches your current directory for a regex pattern while respecting your gitignore rules

tools.name: rsync
tools.description: rsync is a command-line utility that provides fast and efficient file synchronization and transfer capabilities between different systems

tools.name: ruby@3.2
tools.description: ruby@3.2 is a command line interface tool for managing Ruby versions. It allows users to easily switch between different versions of Ruby installed on their system.

tools.name: ssh-copy-id
tools.description: ssh-copy-id is a script that simplifies the process of adding public keys to a remote machine's authorized_keys file. It securely copies the local public key to the remote machine.

tools.name: teamookla/speedtest/speedtest
tools.description: speedtest is a CLI tool developed by teamookla for testing internet speed and performance using the Speedtest.net infrastructure.

tools.name: tilt
tools.description: Tilt is a CLI tool that helps developers manage local development environments by automating tasks like building, deploying, and watching for changes in code.

tools.name: tmux
tools.description: tmux is a terminal multiplexer that allows multiple terminal sessions to be accessed and controlled from a single window.

tools.name: wget
tools.description: GNU Wget is a free utility for non-interactive download of files from the web. It supports HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP protocols, as well as retrieval through HTTP proxies.

tools.name: yamlfmt
tools.description: yamlfmt is a simple command-line tool for formatting YAML files

tools.name: yarn
tools.description: Yarn is a package manager that securely installs dependencies in a project, for faster and more reliable builds.

tools.name: yq
tools.description: yq is a lightweight and portable command-line YAML processor. It allows you to filter, query, and manipulate YAML files using a simple and expressive syntax.

tools.name: yt-dlp
tools.description: yt-dlp is a command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other sites. It is a fork of youtube-dl with additional features and improvements.

tools.name: zlib
tools.description: zlib is a software library for data compression. It provides in-memory compression and decompression functions, including functions that transparently support the gzip file format.
